definition: an influence that works subtly to lighten or modify something, cause to puff up with a leaven
details:
noun
- an influence that works subtly to lighten or modify something
= example: an influence that works subtly to lighten or modify something
= synonyms: leavening
- a substance used to produce fermentation in dough or a liquid
= synonyms: leavening
verb
- cause to puff up with a leaven
= example: cause to puff up with a leaven
= synonyms: raise
